'''Ivriniel''' ({{TA|2947}}-?) was the sister of [[Finduilas (wife of Denethor)|Finduilas]] and [[Imrahil]] of [[Dol Amroth]]. She was the firstborn child of [[Adrahil]].<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, ''The Line of Dol Amroth'', p. 221</ref>
